markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Saberteeth](/Feats.aspx?ID=2316) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 18 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have long fangs, natural or augmented. You gain a jaws unarmed attack that deals 1d6 piercing damage. Your jaws are in the [brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) group and have the [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) trait.
name: Saberteeth
